alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:55PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cass and west central Crow Wing Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Poplar, or 24 miles northwest of Brainerd, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gull Lake and Nisswa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
